Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel for short stay”
Reviews.Author: GodisPyry
Reviews.Content: hotel located near train station 5min walk check leave stuff hotel pick leaving nice near hotel little shops buy food drinks didnt matter breakfast wasnt included prices werent bad pretty clean mould cealing smell washroom wasnt bothering didnt spend time anyways flying night pretty cold luckily pants shirt red coldness usual venice dont means night stay considering cheap price
